text:
Golf returns amid national unrest and a pandemic — and the normal dulcet tones from Jim Nantz won’t simply suffice. 

"We just have to get this moment in history right," he says. https://t.co/a1n10BrTwI

text: City inspector general criticizes Chicago police on records management in criminal and civil cases: So haphazard is it that the department doesn’t even know which documents it possesses, hamstringing its ability to comply with subpoenas https://t.co/TCsrz0wTOT
